Generated Narrative: CodeSystem NIHSS1bLOC

This code system https://kip.rkkp.dk/fhir/CodeSystem/NIHSS1bLOC defines the following codes:

CodeDefinition
0 Answers both questions correctly.
1 Answers one question correctly.
2 Answers neither question correctly.
